name: Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggage, Lilac, 22" Carry-On
short_description: Flexible Size & Set Options for Every Trip: Choose the 22” expandable carry-on alone, the 3-piece travel set (22” carry-on + 15” boarding tote + 10” travel kit), or the complete 5-piece set including 30”, 26”, and 22” suitcases with matching travel accessories
Durable ABS Hardside with Lightweight Construction: Rigid ABS shells protect your belongings while remaining easy to lift, maneuver, and check, ideal for frequent travel and longer trips
Expandable Design for Extra Packing Capacity: All suitcases expand to provide additional space when needed, giving you flexibility for souvenirs, returns, or extended travel
Smooth 360° Spinner Wheels & Telescoping Handle: Four multi-directional spinner wheels and a push-button telescopic handle deliver effortless rolling and stable control through airports and terminals

Coordinated Travel Accessories with Smart Features: Included in the 3 Piece Set and 5 Piece Set options are a 15” boarding tote with add-a-bag sleeve for secure stacking and a compact 10” travel kit to keep essentials organized and accessible
product_description: The Chicago Collection is built for travelers who want dependable performance, smart organization, and flexible options for every trip. Choose from a 22” expandable carry-on, a coordinated 3-piece travel set, or the complete 5-piece luggage system designed to cover everything from quick getaways to extended travel. Durable ABS hardside construction protects your belongings while remaining lightweight and easy to maneuver, and smooth 360° spinner wheels paired with a push-button telescoping handle ensure effortless mobility. Expandable compartments provide extra packing space when needed, while the included boarding tote and travel kit add convenience, organization, and seamless stacking for travel days that move fast.

name: Rockland Fashion Softside Upright Luggage Set, Expandable, Purple Pearl, 2-Piece (14/19)
short_description: Upright: 21" x 13" x 7.5" (with wheels)
Tote bag: 14"x 11" x 5.5"
Telescoping handle

product_description: This beautiful deluxe 2-piece expandable luggage set is manufactured with a patented heavy duty eva-molded hi-count fabric. This set is perfect for the serious and experienced traveler. Manufactured with the very best heavy duty polyester and pvc backing, this luggage set is designed for the traveler on the go and comes with three expandable uprights and a flight tote bag. It comes packed with features including: an inside retractable handle, ez-roll in-line skate wheels, back zippered secured pockets, top and side comfort grip handle, stability bars at the bottom to avoid tilting, and locks and keys. Upright features include: clear in-line skate wheel system for smooth ride, push-button self-locking internally stored retractable handle system, ergonomic and comfortable padded top and side grip handles, two front full size zipper-secured pockets, and three internal organizational pockets for all your traveling needs. Each upright's interior is fully lined with a durable and elegantly imprinted lining and elegant silver pewter heavy duty industrial hardware. Carry-on flight tote bag features include: elegantly imprinted full interior lining, detachable and adjustable non-slip shoulder strap, spacious main compartment, and maximum strength industrial hardware. Carry-on upright: 20 inches high x 13 inches wide x 7.5 inches (with wheels) expandable to 10 inches deep and weighs 6 pounds. Carry-on flight tote bag: 14 inches wide x 11 inches high x 5.5 inches deep and weighs 1 pounds.

Often Imitated, Never Equaled: Every SwissGear product reflects our 125-year legacy of innovation, Swiss precision in design, and an unwavering commitment to the highest standards of quality.
product_description: Experience ultimate convenience with the SwissGear Signature Hardside Expandable Carry-On with Cup Holder. Designed for frequent travelers, this 19-inch carry-on is made from durable ABS to withstand the wear and tear of travel. It features a split-case expandable design to maximize packing space while keeping belongings organized with multiple internal pockets. Equipped with eight 360-degree multi-directional spinner wheels and a push-button steel locking telescopic handle, this suitcase glides effortlessly through crowded airports. A unique built-in cup holder adds an extra level of convenience, allowing you to keep your beverage within reach while on the move. With outside dimensions of 22" x 14.25" x 10" and 19" x 14" x 10" of packing space, this compact yet spacious carry-on is ideal for short trips. Plus, it includes a 10-year warranty for peace of mind.
